text: "I Will Never Let You Down" is a song by British recording artist Rita Ora. It was first planned as lead single for her upcoming second studio album. But it was later released as a buzz single. It was written and produced by Calvin Harris. The single was released on 31 March 2014. The song debuted at number one on the UK Singles Chart making it Ora's fourth overall UK number-one single. The music video features twin dancers Polly Duniam and Sophie Duniam. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:2014 songs Category:Calvin Harris Category:Dance-pop songs Category:R&B; songs Category:Rita Ora songs
title: I Will Never Let You Down
